verses.roman:
raghunātha-dāsa aṅgīkāra nā karila
dravya lañā dui-jana tāhāṅi rahila

synonyms: raghunātha-dāsa—Raghunātha dāsa; aṅgīkāra nā karila—did not accept; dravya lañā—taking the wealth; dui-jana—two persons; tāhāṅi rahila—remained there.
translation: Raghunātha dāsa did not accept the money and men sent by his father. Therefore a servant and the brāhmaṇa stayed there with the money.
